summary: Full stack testing of Market Ready platform. All 7 backend tests passed. Frontend UI tested: homepage, login, register, guide page with MRI stress test, GitHub proof auditor, and 90-Day mission dashboard. All core features working end-to-end.

issues: Shows 'Please log in' message with fields still visible - minor UX inconsistency but not blocking

critical_code_review_comments: No data-testid attributes on interactive elements (login inputs, buttons) - makes automated testing harder
Backend API uses X-Auth-Token header (not standard Bearer Authorization) - unconventional but consistent across frontend/backend
Guide page accessible without auth but shows 'Please log in' message - forms are visible but disabled functionally only via JS check
context_for_next_testing_agent: App uses X-Auth-Token header for auth (not Bearer). Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_market_ready.py. Test user: debugtest123/TestPass123!. All 3 core features (MRI stress test, GitHub proof auditor, 90-day mission) working. Adzuna+CareerOneStop integrations live and returning data.
